mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR (CAR_NO, CAR_COMPANY, CAR_MODEL_YEAR, CAR_MODEL, CAR_FUAL, CAR_ENGINEOILRP, CAR_DISTANCEDRIVEN, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (seq_car.nextval, #{car_company},#{car_model_year}, #{car_model}, #{car_fual},#{car_engineoilrp},#{car_distancedriven},#{member_id})
mapper.update: update car set car_company = #{car_company}, car_model_year = #{car_model_year}, car_model = #{car_model}, car_fual = #{car_fual}, car_engineoilrp = #{car_engineoilrp}, car_distancedriven = #{car_distancedriven}, car_updateDate= sysdate where member_id = #{member_id}
